statements: SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT record_id, patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE patient_id = 123
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY record_id ASC, record_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT treatment, diagnosis FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY record_id DESC
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(record_id) as record_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id HAVING record_count > 3
SELECT * FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, record_date FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(record_id) AS record_count FROM medical_records GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM medical_records ORDER BY patient_id DESC, record_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT treatment FROM medical_records WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientData ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientData WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_date, doctor_name, treatment_details FROM TreatmentRecords WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM PatientData WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, doctor_name FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentRecords ON PatientData.patient_id = TreatmentRecords.patient_id WHERE TreatmentRecords.treatment_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT patient_name, treatment_details FROM PatientData JOIN TreatmentRecords ON PatientData.patient_id = TreatmentRecords.patient_id WHERE TreatmentRecords.doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientData WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT diagnosis, diagnosis_date FROM diagnoses WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT test_name, result_value, result_date FROM lab_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender, diagnosis, result_value FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.id = d.patient_id JOIN lab_results l ON p.id = l.patient_id WHERE p.age >= 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT d.diagnosis, p.name FROM diagnoses AS d JOIN patients AS p ON d.patient_id = p.id WHERE d.diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT l.test_name, l.result_value, p.name FROM lab_results AS l JOIN patients AS p ON l.patient_id = p.id WHERE l.result_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY l.result_value DESC;
SELECT p.name, COUNT(*) AS diagnosis_count FROM patients AS p JOIN diagnoses AS d ON p.id = d.patient_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING diagnosis_count > 2;
SELECT AVG(age) AS avg_age, MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors;
SELECT visit_date, prescription FROM Visits;
SELECT lab_name, test_name, result FROM Labs;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender='F' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology'
SELECT lab_name, test_name, result, test_date FROM Labs WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY test_date DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM medications WHERE dosage >= 5.0;
SELECT treatment_name, start_date, end_date FROM treatments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age ASC

SELECT p.patient_name, d.diagnosis_text, t.treatment_name, m.medication_name FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON d.diagnosis_id = t.diagnosis_id JOIN medications m ON t.treatment_id = m.treatment_id WHERE p.age < 40 ORDER BY p.patient_name ASC
SELECT p.patient_name, l.lab_test, l.result_value FROM patients p JOIN lab_results l ON p.patient_id = l.patient_id WHERE l.result_value > 100 ORDER BY l.result_date DESC

SELECT p.patient_name, d.diagnosis_date, t.start_date, t.end_date FROM patients p JOIN diagnoses d ON p.patient_id = d.patient_id JOIN treatments t ON d.diagnosis_id = t.diagnosis_id WHERE t.start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.start_date ASC
